languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: пред отбытием с Футфола посыльные в дорогих одеждах доставили на корабль шкатулку и несколько сундуков, помеченных гербом Дома Орселлио. Полагаю, использование для столь обыденных нужд ряженных в золото слуг, а не сервиторов... несколько экстравагантный способ навигаторского Дома привлечь внимание Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: пред отбытием с Футфола посыльные в дорогих одеждах доставили на корабль шкатулку и несколько сундуков, помеченных гербом Дома Орселлио. Полагаю, использование для столь обыденных нужд ряженных в золото слуг, а не сервиторов... несколько экстравагантный способ навигаторского дома привлечь внимание Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: пред отбытием с Футфола посыльные в дорогих одеждах доставили на корабль шкатулку и несколько сундуков, помеченных гербом Дома Орселлио. Полагаю, использование для столь обыденных нужд ряженных в золото слуг, а не сервиторов... несколько экстравагантный способ навигаторского Дома привлечь внимание Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I am reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garb delivered a box and a several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

"Lord Captain, I am reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garb delivered a box and a several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

"Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

"Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “请允许我向您报告，舰长大人。我们离开落脚港没过多久，一群穿着奢华制服的信使便将一个保险箱和几个带有奥赛罗家族印记的箱子送到了船上。负责运送箱子的并不是机仆，而是披金戴银的仆人……我相信，这样的做法是导航者家族奢侈的手段，试图引起行商浪人的注意。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我向您报告，舰长大人。我们离开落脚港没过多久，一群穿着奢华制服的信使便将一个保险箱和几个带有奥塞罗家族印记的箱子送到了船上。负责运送箱子的并不是奴工，而是披金戴银的仆人……我相信，这样的做法是导航者家族奢侈的手段，试图引起行商浪人的注意。”

languages.text: « Voici mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Peu de temps avant notre départ de Castel, un groupe de messagers richement vêtus a livré sur le vaisseau un coffre-fort et plusieurs caisses frappés de l'insigne de la maison Orsellio. Je suppose qu'en employant des domestiques en tenue d'apparat plutôt que des servitors, leur but était d'attirer l'attention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Voici mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Peu de temps avant notre départ de Castel, un groupe de messagers richement vêtus a livré sur le vaisseau un coffre-fort et plusieurs caisses frappés de l'insigne de la maison Orsellio. Je suppose qu'en employant des domestiques en tenue d'apparat plutôt que des servitors, leur but était d'attirer l'attention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le informo de que, poco después de marcharse de Paso, un grupo de mensajeros vestidos con lujosas indumentarias nos hicieron entrega de una caja fuerte y varios cofres con la insignia de la casa Orsellio. Supongo que enviar a sirvientes con ropas doradas en vez de servidores ha sido un claro intento por parte de los navegantes de atraer la atención de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le informo de que, poco después de marcharse de Paso, un grupo de mensajeros vestidos con lujosas indumentarias nos hicieron entrega de una caja fuerte y varios cofres con la insignia de la casa Orsellio. Supongo que enviar a sirvientes con ropas doradas en vez de servidores ha sido un claro intento por parte de los navegantes de atraer la atención de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告です。フットフォールから出航する少し前、豪華な衣装を身にまとった使者の一団が、オーセリオ家の記章が入った貴重品箱といくつかの櫃を船に届けてきました。サーヴィターの代わりに黄金をまとった従者をよこしたのは…自由開拓者の注意を引くための航宙士たちの大げさな企てだったのでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告です。フットフォールから出航する少し前、豪華な衣装を身にまとった使者の一団が、オーセリオ家の記章が入った貴重品箱といくつかの櫃を船に届けてきました。サーヴィターの代わりに黄金をまとった従者をよこしたのは…自由開拓者の注意を引くための航宙士たちの大げさな企てだったのでしょうね」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Berichterstattung. Kurz vor unserer Abreise von Footfall kam eine Gruppe von Boten in luxuriösen Gewändern vorbei und übergab uns einen Tresor und mehrere Truhen mit den Insignien von Haus Orsellio. Das Entsenden von in Gold gekleideten Dienern anstelle von Servitoren ... stellt wohl einen extravaganten Versuch der Navigatoren dar, die Aufmerksamkeit des {mf|Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu erregen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Berichterstattung. Kurz vor unserer Abreise von Footfall kam eine Gruppe von Boten in luxuriösen Gewändern vorbei und übergab uns einen Tresor und mehrere Truhen mit den Insignien von Haus Orsellio. Das Entsenden von in Gold gekleideten Dienern anstelle von Servitoren ... stellt wohl einen extravaganten Versuch der Navigatoren dar, die Aufmerksamkeit des {mf|Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu erregen."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, rapor veriyorum. Şatafatlı kıyafetler giyen bir grup elçi, biz Binliman'dan ayrılmadan hemen önce gemiye Orsellio Hanesi'nin nişanını taşıyan birkaç sandık ve bir kasa teslim etti. Rotacıların hizmetörler yerine gösterişli hizmetkârlar göndermeleri... Hür Tacir'in dikkatini çekmek için tutumsuzca bir teşebbüsten ibaret."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting. Shortly before our departure from Footfall a group of messengers in luxurious garbs delivered a strongbox and several chests bearing the insignia of House Orsellio to the ship. I suppose the use of gold-clad servants instead of servitors... was an extravagant attempt by the Navigators to draw the attention of the Rogue Trader."
